mapper.sql: id , sku_code , sku_name , price , stock , last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, create_time as createTime
mapper.select: SELECT spu.id AS spuId, spu.item_name AS itemName, sku.price AS mPrice, sku.img_path AS imgPath FROM item_spu spu LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.price, s.spu_id, s.img_path FROM item_sku s GROUP BY s.spu_id) sku ON spu.id = sku.spu_id

SELECT itb.brand_name AS brandName, s.shop_name AS shopName, spu.item_name AS itemName, sku.price, sku.promotion_price AS promotionPrice, sku.img_path AS imgPath, sku.stock FROM item_spu spu RIGHT JOIN item_brand itb ON itb.id = spu.brand_id RIGHT JOIN shop_info s ON s.id = spu.shop_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.price, s.promotion_price, s.spu_id, s.img_path, s.stock FROM item_sku s GROUP BY s.spu_id) sku ON sku.spu_id = spu.id
spu.id = #{spuId}
